context.p: To edit description for agents, which will appear on the mainscreen of the local agent, follow below procedures.

step.cmd: Go to Agents in the top navigation bar of the StellarOne web console.
Click the All group on the Agents screen. The Agents screen displays a list of agents managed by StellarOne.
There are two ways to edit descriptions for agent(s):

choices.choice: To edit description for muiltiple agents at the same time, click the checkboxes next to the target agents or groups. Click the Organize tool on the toolbar.

choice.p: To edit description for a single agent, click the kebab menu (three dots menu) corresponding to the target agent under the Actions header.

step.cmd: A drop-down menu appears. Click the first option Edit Description, and then a window appears.
Input the description for the agent in the text field.
Click Confirm to complete this task.
